item.title: ABSTRACThinking
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:8, topic:208410”][quote author=brownsymcard link=topic=274695.msg2245328#msg2245328 date=1211905806]
it looks great, its nice when actual art is posted here. Is it vector? If it is, a simple resize should fix your AA problem. (BTW, it looks great without colors even).
[/quote]

Correct me if I’m wrong, but vectors can be resized to any size and keep the detail and stuff right, because they’re made of equations and shit? Whatever.

That would mean if they were small they’d still look the same, just smaller.

This just looks like a normal image got shrunk and now has AA problems. Don’t think that happens to vectors. Then again I haven’t worked with them in a long long time.[/quote]

Correct. Thinking of making a hi-res version so it looks good.

[quote=“goatee, post:4, topic:208410”]Looks promising! Took me a while to notice the face, which is why i love abstract. Just been looking on deviantart at some of their stuff… jesus.

How long did it take you to do the crazy complex bit? Also what program.[/quote]

I don’t really deserve all the credit I’m getting TBH. I just put the idea together, with a little editing here and there.

I got the wireframes from stinky666 : http://stinky666.deviantart.com/art/WireFrame-Pack-5-85114539
I put the rest together in photoshop, took a picture of my face and outlined it ( the lips look ackward though ).

Read full topic

item.title: ABSTRACThinking
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

brownsymcard:

it looks great, its nice when actual art is posted here. Is it vector? If it is, a simple resize should fix your AA problem. (BTW, it looks great without colors even).

Correct me if I’m wrong, but vectors can be resized to any size and keep the detail and stuff right, because they’re made of equations and shit? Whatever.

That would mean if they were small they’d still look the same, just smaller.

This just looks like a normal image got shrunk and now has AA problems. Don’t think that happens to vectors. Then again I haven’t worked with them in a long long time.

Read full topic

item.title: ABSTRACThinking
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

I like it. It’s really nice. The face is fine, and like goatee said, it took a little while for me to notice it because my attention was immediately drawn to the massively detailed part. They actually look like “modern” buildings, such as the Armadillo, if you know it. Strange. What were you going for when you made it? Like, meaning-wise?

Read full topic

If you colour this I’ll have an orgasm over your face.
